title: Toda lattice and Riemann type minimal surfaces
authors: Changfeng Gui, Yong Liu, Jun Wang, Wen Yang
abstract:
Toda lattice and minimal surfaces are related to each other through
Allen-Cahn equation. In view of the structure of the solutions of the Toda
lattice, we find new balancing configuration using techniques of integrable
systems. This allows us to construct new singly periodic minimal surfaces. The
genus of these minimal surfaces equals $j(j+1)/2-1$. They are natural
generalization of the Riemann minimal surfaces, which have genus zero.
subjects: Nonlinear Sciences/Exactly Solvable and Integrable Systems
